duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer first aid and emergency care to students as necessary.
Monitor and maintain order during lunch and recess periods to ensure student safety.
Minimize hall traffic and identify loiterers and trespassers to maintain a safe environment for students.
Report observations and incidents to teachers and administration to communicate relevant information.
Administer playground equipment to support student activities.
Facilitate age-appropriate games and activities among students.
Respond to student concerns and ensure student safety.
Assist other school personnel as needed in completing their work activities.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent education and job experience.
Red Cross First Aid/CPR Card (or equivalent)
Oregon Criminal background and Fingerprint clearance
